TopicTitle: Kerbal Plumbing Corp - External Commode Seat

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Plumbing Corp

PRESENTS

The External Commode Seat!

Due to a clerical error on a custom order, Kerbal Plumbing Corp decided to enter the space race with their new External Commode Seat. Adventure space from the comfort of an oversized toilet. NOTE: May cause electrical shock if used like a real toilet.

Functions like the External Command seat. Place it somewhere, right click, select board. Enjoy!

Download now! http://www./download/6r4grgn1ys1n2jy/CommodeSeat.zip

HAHA! was wondering why you never posted this!

FINALLY...you know how long my deep space mining crew has been complaining about no toilet??

Gonna subscribe this one...this thread is gonna have some of the more funny screencaps in KSP history I bet.

HAHA! was wondering why you never posted this!

FINALLY...you know how long my deep space mining crew has been complaining about no toilet??

Gonna subscribe this one...this thread is gonna have some of the more funny screencaps in KSP history I bet.

I had to learn blender first. The first time I made this idea up, I borrowed a toilet model I found online. This time I can actually give it away and take credit for the model. I plan on expanding them with a few options. Like small rockets, etc.

Adds a whole new dimension to Porta Potty..

Edit: You should make an animated lid and have the kerbal height adjustable so Jeb can pop out of it, like a jack-in-the-box, except a kerbal-in-the-kan. Have it controlled with infernal robotics.

Edit 2: maybe make the flusher handle eject the kerbal.

Edited August 7, 2013 by Dave7

I plan on expanding them with a few options. Like small rockets, etc.

Oh rockets....thought you were gonna say urinals, or some of them disposable seat covers o.O...

Maybe you could add an escape hatch at bottom so the Kerbal can be 'flushed' to saftey in the event of technical difficulties(or if someone leaves an upper-decker).
I was wondering how long it would take for sombody to do this ... I may have to find a way to use this in an escape system... Hmmm.
LOL That's wrong on so many levels.
Lol, it just mounts so well radially doesn't it

Use I-Beams and Struts to make an aesthetic restroom for your stations

Now that Devo & I published smaller hinges from the Infernal Robotics parts pack you could even have a door with a hinge on it!

I'll make a standard sized toilet. I think it would be great to have it as a prop
I wonder who my first kerbal is thats going to empty themselves in space.
Too bad there won't be any aliens in KSP, or we could have something like this happen...
Oh, we all know that Bill and Bob empty themselves on every launch anyway...
Could you stick a parachute in the tank? For use in extremely amusing escape systems?
Sorry to necro, but what's the license on this thing? I want to use it in my Bargain Rockets pack.
